relation: You can visit the school library, walk around with your friends, visit the lake.
The food at the cafeteria is delicious.
There aren't any dorms on campus.
Students are asked to develop individual thinking skills about what they are learning and then combine those thinking skills into thinking processes which they then apply to the content.
Buy a parking permit, be punctual, do your homework, make friends, talk to everybody.
Evergreen Valley college is a very nice, normal size, campus. It is a very diversed school. It is a friendly environment.

textAfterTable: Emily Shih 12/25/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 29 Categories Comments Bang for the buck Evergreen college is affordable, great school to get your foot in the college door. Food and Dining I always bring my own snack all the time so no comment on this. Dorm Life I live at home so I can give any comment on this. Academic Rigor professors are great and professional. Tips for prospective students Register your class early ! class seems to be filled up pretty quick. In three sentences Evergreen college is a great college. They have lots evening classes that fits my busy schedule. Thou I can be a stay home mom in the daytime and a college student at night.
